name: Balloon Archery (YaEnergy)
description:
A small and simple game about shooting some balloons with your bow and arrow. Try to shoot as many balloons as you can! Miss one, and you'll get a red cross. Have 3 red crosses, and you're out! Every 5 levels, one red cross will be removed.

Have fun!

Rotate Camera - Move mouse
Shoot & charge bow - Click & hold LMB
Pause/Resume - Press Escape
